Package cafe

Class CurrentOrderController

java.lang.Object
cafe.CurrentOrderController
public class CurrentOrderController
extends java.lang.Object
The "control" class that implements functionalities for the current order GUI.

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CurrentOrderController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void goToMainMenu()
    Method to go to the main menu GUI from the current order GUI
    void initialize()
    Method to initialize all the table columns and create objects pertaining to menuItemID, itemDetails, and price
    void placeOrder()
    Method to place an order from the item list in the current order GUI After order is placed, an alert appears indicating it and order is added to the store orders GUI
    void removeOrder()
    Method to remove a selection from the item list in the current order GUI Selection is removed when checkbox next to the selection is clicked

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
